vim Usage note

Introduce Vim usage
<!--more-->

Basic:

command | function
--------------- | --------------------
:e file | Open filename for edition
:W | Save file
:q | Exit vim
:q! | Quit without saving
:x | Write file (if file changed), and exit
:sav filename | Saves as filename
. | Repeats the last change made in normal mode

Move:

command | function
| ---------------- | --------------------------------------------------| h,j,k,l | move the cursor left, down, up, right e | the end of the word b | the begin of the word 0 | the begin of the line $ | the end of the line G | the end of the file gg| the beginning of the file L | the end of the screen :number | to line number number| | to column number % | to match parenthesis [[ | function start [{ | block start
